song.full_title: Handsome and Gretel (Minneapolism) by Babes In Toyland
song.title: Handsome and Gretel (Minneapolism)
song.lyrics:
Handsome and Gretel (Minneapolism) Lyrics[Verse 1]
Gretel said
I know what's in your head
I vacuumed out my head
I know you're feeling bad, you fuckin' bitch
You cunthole bitch
I thought she meant it, yeah
She really jacked my head
She went and done it, yeah

[Chorus]
Handsome
Gretel
Handsome
Gretel
[Verse 2]
My name is Gretel, yeah
I've got a crotch that talks
It talks to all the cocks
It's been twelve city blocks, you fuckin' bitch
Gretel said
I know you feel so bad
I know you feel so bad
I thought she meant it, yeah

[Chorus]
Handsome
Gretel
Handsome
Gretel

[Verse 3]
Yeah, ha ha ha
I vacuumed out my head
Jumping from bed to bed, my name is Gretel
A soul of metal
My name is Gretel, yeah
I've got a sloppy slot

[Chorus]
Handsome
Gretel
Handsome
Gretel
You might also like[Verse 4]
Asphixia
My thighs are vices, yeah
He is a stupid man
I love him all I can, you fuckin’ bitch
Addle girl
She pulls out all her curls
She is a stupid crotch
That spans twelve city blocksEmbed
